For sale are two graded T3 Turkey Reds.

Harry Krause PSA 4(mk) SOLD
Wild Bill Donovan PSA 4(mk) SOLD

Willing to listen to offers and trade for raw lower grade T3 Turkey Reds.

I would like payment to be a paypal gift to [url]lisajoe97@yahoo.com[/url].

Send me an email if you would like larger pics.

Thanks,
Joe
